data.text: @JimmyWantResult @hkfp 🤗 突然唔洗俾公眾知道佢嘅感受啦

@Star20861 @hkfp Yes, she finally understands 😌

林鄭：我相信大家都唔想成日見到我㗎喇
https://t.co/G4ChdqDxHW
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

@hkfp Infections WILL collapse over coming weeks similar to every other omicron wave in the world & it will have nothing to do with silly mask mandates, business closures and panic & fear campaigns which collapsed the hospital system. Open everything up & remove all restrictions!
@hkfp “Not valuing every life”…? Practically stating “for political goal.. lives worthless”… those value their own lives must beware.. including those supporting Hong Kong Government.
9/ "It's meaningless to argue whether [the government's attitude] is 'living with Covid' or 'zero infection,'" Lam said, adding that the administration was not "laying down" and valued every life.
@hkfp Just for Carrie Lam to bootlick Central Government’s “assistance” everyday. Really the worst decision of the already failed covid communications.

8/ However, Lam said that universal testing can still facilitate the reopening of businesses by finding and cutting all invisible transmission chains, and that the government will look for a suitable time to conduct such work.
7/ Compulsory universal testing is not needed at the moment to understand the scale of infections in Hong Kong, as rapid antigen tests are widely used in the city, Lam said.

6/ The chief executive also said that the administration is aiming to have the emergency hospital located at Lok Ma Chau Loop to begin operations starting in mid April, supported by mainland medical teams.
@hkfp The govt The govt The govt …. Quislings, idiots . Just leave us alone
